results.title: Microsoft.AwsConnector/snsTopics - Bicep, ARM template & Terraform AzAPI reference
results.description: Azure Microsoft.AwsConnector/snsTopics syntax and properties to use in Azure Resource Manager templates for deploying the resource. API version latest

descriptions.content: If you specify the Subscription property in the AWS::SNS::Topic resource and it creates an associated subscription resource, the associated subscription is not deleted when the AWS::SNS::Topic resource is deleted.
